description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: DIR-822 Rev. B Firmware v2.02KRB09 and DIR-822-CA Rev. B Firmware v2.03WWb01 suffer from a LAN-Side Unauthenticated Remote Code Execution (RCE) vulnerability elevated from HNAP Stack-Based Buffer Overflow.

El firmware DIR-822 Rev. B v2.02KRB09 y el firmware DIR-822-CA Rev. B v2.03WWb01 sufren una vulnerabilidad de ejecución remota de código (RCE) no autenticado en el lado LAN elevada por desbordamiento de búfer en la región stack de la memoria HNAP.
